info.title: Eventee
info.description: Organize hybrid, virtual or in-person events in a few moments. Engage your audience with the most user-friendly event app.

lectures.name: Apple Special Event
lectures.description: Learn how we're helping teachers ignite the creativity in every student with powerful technology, innovative tools, and a new curriculum that brings creative expression to every subject. And get a first look at the new iPad, which now supports Apple Pencil.

workshops.name: Apple Special Event
workshops.description: Learn how we're helping teachers ignite the creativity in every student with powerful technology, innovative tools, and a new curriculum that brings creative expression to every subject. And get a first look at the new iPad, which now supports Apple Pencil.

pauses.name: Morning networking break
pauses.description:
Take a quick coffee break and meet some of your fellow attendees on your way to either the Terrace for some Breakout Sessions, or stretch your legs before the first expert discussion panel of the day begins...

Bottomless Cups of Coffee provided by FeedMob.

speakers.name: Tim Cook
speakers.bio: Timothy Donald „Tim“ Cook je výkonný riaditeľ spoločnosti Apple Inc. Tim Cook začal pracovať v Apple Inc. od marca 1998, v roku 2007 bol povýšený na prevádzkového riaditeľa.

get.description: Recieve all available content of your event including halls, sessions and breaks.

example-1.comment: Fascinating subject. Exceptionally relevant (especially today!). Thanks for kicking off the day!

lecture.name: Apple Special Event
lecture.description: Learn how we're helping teachers ignite the creativity in every student with powerful technology, innovative tools, and a new curriculum that brings creative expression to every subject. And get a first look at the new iPad, which now supports Apple Pencil.

stars.description: Minimal value is 0 and maximal value is 5.

user_id.description: User object id who made review.

lecture_id.description: Lecture object id which was reviewed.

hall_id.description: Hall object id to which session will be assigned.

discussion.description: If this is true, users can ask questions during session. Default: false

moderating.description: Defines if questions are moderated. Default: false

polling.description: Defines if polls are enabled for session. Default: false

capacity.description: For workshop type of session. Defines how many users can book to workshop. Minimum is 0.

type.description: If session is lecture or workshop.

value.comment: Fascinating subject. Exceptionally relevant (especially today!). Thanks for kicking off the day!

lecture.name: Apple Special Event
lecture.description: Learn how we're helping teachers ignite the creativity in every student with powerful technology, innovative tools, and a new curriculum that brings creative expression to every subject. And get a first look at the new iPad, which now supports Apple Pencil.

delete.description: Delete all tracks, pauses, speakers, workshops, lectures and halls from your event.

post.description: Create a new hall to your event.

patch.description: Update an existing hall from your event.

delete.description: Delete an existing hall from your event.

url.description: Deeplink url to your event. After accessing this url, user will be redirected to you event in Eventee app.

qr_code.description: url to QR code image file containing url attribute.

photo.description: Upload only square photos, otherwise it will be deformed. Max length: 512 chars.

send_email.description: If true, we will send email to attendee inviting him to your event.

number.description: Ticket number to be encoded in bar code on our side. Max length: 512 chars.

url.description: Ticket url to be shown on our side. Max length: 512 chars.

type.description: Ticket type. How do you want it to be rendered on in our application.

delete.description: Remove invited attendee from your event. If attendee has already entered your event, he will loose access to your event and all information linking him to event will be removed.

role.description: One of the following values: 'a' - Admin, 'm' - Moderator, 'e' - Attendee

get.description: Get basic info about all your attendees.
